bill.title: Homemade beer; authorize making of homemade beer for domestic or household uses.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 67-3-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Every Person Who Is 21 Years Of Age Or Older Shall Have The Right To Make Homemade Beer For Domestic Or Household Uses; To Provide That Homemade Beer Made For Domestic Or Household Use Is Not Subject To Taxation; To Limit The Amount Of Homemade Beer That May Be Produced In Any One Calendar Year; To Authorize The Removal Of Homemade Beer From The Location Where It Is Made For Family Or Domestic Uses And To Authorize Homemade Beer To Be Taken To Organized Events, Exhibitions Or Competitions; To Make It Clear That Homemade Wine Or Beer May Not Be Offered For Sale; And For Related Purposes.
